channel.title: Hardcore cape
channel.description:
Hey peeps i'm new to modeling but i Just recolored and added text to a cape and i wanted to know what u guys think of it so her it is.:
Back Side. [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/fy045s.jpg[/img]
Front Side. [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2uhvngp.jpg[/img]
Right Side. [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2ufytz8.jpg[/img]

item.title: Hardcore cape
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“vexx1345, post:11, topic:312086”][quote author=Assassins Creed Fan link=topic=408527.msg3016862#msg3016862 date=1257264891]

No offense, WE NEED TO MOVE AWAY FROM SHITTY RECOLORS, trust me on this. Also, whats up with this?

Hey peeps i’m new to modeling but i made my own cape and i wanted to know what u guys think of it so her it is.:

Thats a bit off, you didnt make shit, you added text and colored it.

Ye lol ur right.
[/quote]No need to ‘lol’ about something like this.
You could have known that this would come up shitty (IMO it is.very).
You can practice with Metasequoia but don’t post recolors…
It will give members a bad first impression of yourself, which you can’t re-do!
By the way , did you know that a first impression of a person and/or his skills is made in only 0,8 seconds?
That’s just quick.
All what I want to say, practice a little before posting models into this section, and after all this is a recolor.
Doesn’t make it ‘hardcore’ or ‘yours’ in [i]ANY way.
Don’t do recolors either, well maybe for fun.
But don’t post them here.

same speech i got when i did my first crappy recouler model ^.^[/quote]It’s not the same

Read full topic

item.title: Hardcore cape
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

ok its about time I post basicly you didnt make shit. I know its been said already but really make sometime usefull you know a sword…maybe an axe? or make a cape but from nothing no base or anything it would be better then. basicly if you are going to post stuff thats recolored most peopel will flame. go read CJ’s tut and learn to model or dont post models…please.

Read full topic

item.title: Hardcore cape
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:10, topic:312086”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=408527.msg3016038#msg3016038 date=1257197201]

the hard core part is useless, in-game it would look like scribbles.

[/quote]^ This.
In metaseq it looks fine, but in-game it shows up a bit smaller with crappy quality and the text will be barely readable.

Good job anyway.

omgwtfbbq?

why did i leave this board, because i get flamed for trying to make anything from scratch, so i recoloured objects, got flamed for that too… now people are encouraging recoloured capes?[/quote]

nobody is encouraging it, although he did say good job which it isnt…

Read full topic

Hey peeps i’m new to modeling but i made my own cape and i wanted to know what u guys think of it so her it is.:

Thats a bit off, you didnt make shit, you added text and colored it.

You could have known that this would come up shitty (IMO it is.very).
You can practice with Metasequoia but don’t post recolors…
It will give members a bad first impression of yourself, which you can’t re-do!
By the way , did you know that a first impression of a person and/or his skills is made in only 0,8 seconds?
That’s just quick.
All what I want to say, practice a little before posting models into this section, and after all this is a recolor.
Doesn’t make it ‘hardcore’ or ‘yours’ in [i]ANY way.
Don’t do recolors either, well maybe for fun.
But don’t post them here.[/quote]
same speech i got when i did my first crappy recouler model ^.^
